Text: Agbagba le̩, abu kʼo̩wo̩-amone̩ icham nyʼo̩gwo̩ko̩ wewe wa jʼugbokate ku ma chane̩ edʼe̩re̩ do omune̩, i chane̩ eka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ ejodudu kakini, Ame̩ ki mʼo̩la-me̩ ne̩ ugbo o̩jo̩wu amaFarisi kʼi chʼayechi.
I nʼe̩wñ du ku ma kʼe̩wñ bʼo ma ku ma ma abi rʼeju ni n, kpʼe̩wñ kʼi maja ku ma ma ama ni n.
E̩wñ du ku me̩ ka ef e̩chubi le̩, ma agbo̩ ef ugane̩; oñ e̩wñ ku me̩ ko̩la nyʼone̩ eti ef unyi eje-fu, ma atakoya-wñ ojokunyi.
Oñ naka ñw me̩ ku me̩ chʼamonuku-mi, kakini, Me̩ ki railo abo ku ma kpa año̩la ofo n, ku ma ma ne̩ e̩wñ du ku ma neke che tʼe-le̩ le n.
U muda ajuka ñw me̩ e̩ne̩ ku ma arailo-wñ; me̩ ki railo e̩ne̩ kʼi akpa kʼi ño̩ nʼo̩da edurikpolo tef una uña ubie̩; ochochi, naka ñw me̩, me̩ narailo e̩ne̩ le̩.
Ma ta amicho̩lo̩ me̩lu iko̩bo̩ meji n? okate ef uma alʼO̩jo̩ eju n.
I chaka chʼiloji oji-me̩ i chenʼaluka chaka. Me̩ ki railo n: ame̩ nʼaja tʼamicho̩lo̩ wewe le̩.
Oñ naka ñw me̩ kakini, E̩ne̩ du ki agbalu mi eju amone̩. O̩ma One̩ ñʼagbalu e̩ne̩ le̩ eju amonuche̩ O̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩ ki muda fʼaire̩-mi re̩ eju amone̩, ma arʼaire̩ e̩ne̩ le̩ eju amonuche̩ O̩jo̩.
E̩ne̩ du kʼi la fʼo̩laʼka ka nyʼO̩ma One̩, ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u; ama e̩ne̩ ki muda achakpabie̩ Afu Kiafo̩ ma atʼo̩ no̩ ñw u n.
Oñ e̩gba du ku ma ko me̩ wʼo̩gba abʼunyi ujeju kpʼamagboji kpʼabo̩da, me̩ ki dejiji alu ku me̩ ale ku me̩ adohi n, abe̩k e̩wñ ku me̩ aka n:
todu Afu Kiafo̩ ako̩ me̩ e̩wñ ki dukpe̩ ku me̩ ka iko le̩ kpakpa.
Oñ e̩ne̩ʼka ef o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ ka ñw u kakini, Akone̩wñ, ka ñw o̩maye-mi kʼi fʼe̩wñ-ogu kpe̩ kpʼomi.
Jisusi muda ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ one̩-i, e̩ne̩ dʼumi chʼakajo̩ abe̩k onu e̩wñ-e̩kpe̩ ugbo me̩?
Tak i ka ñw ma kakini, Me̩ nago, me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ de ugbo ejufufu du: todu i chʼef idu-one̩ kʼi chʼololo oñ iñmi-wñ de̩ n.
Oñ i fʼita kpa ñw ma kakini, Ane̩ uche̩ ananaʼka rʼo̩je̩ ñw u:
tak i kpʼibe kakini, E̩wñ nache, todabu kʼu ma ne̩ ugbo kʼu nakʼe̩ro e̩wñ oko-mi jo̩ n?
Tak i kakini, E̩wñ kʼu nache de̩: nachi akami wane̩, kʼu naro̩ e-ki tʼe-i le; oñ nakʼo̩ka-mi kpʼe̩wñ-mi ki nyo̩ chaka jʼo̩mo̩.
Taku naka ñw onugo-mi kakini, Onugo-mi, e̩ che̩nʼe̩wñ ki nyo̩ nana kʼe̩ ko jo̩ anede o̩do̩ wewe; ñmi ke, je̩ ke, ñmo̩ ke, gwoguyo̩ ke.
O̩jo̩ muda ka ñw u kakini, E̩nidada-i! odu eñini-i ma tene onugo-we̩ ugbo we̩, e̩wñ kʼe̩ la ñwo̩che jo̩, e̩ne̩ ane̩ ge̩?
Abe̩le̩ e̩ne̩ ki afe̩do̩ e̩wñ akoko tane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi ma la chʼanana ñw O̩jo̩ n de̩.
Tak i ka ñw amako̩che̩-wñ kakini, Lef e-kide̩ naka ñwu me̩, kakini, Me̩ ki dejiji tod oji-me̩ n, e̩wñ ku me̩ aje̩ n; kpʼaño̩la-me̩, e̩wñ ku me̩ adu tʼo̩ n.
Todu oji one̩ tʼuje̩wñ le, año̩la la tʼe̩wñ ku ma du tʼo̩ le.
Me̩ ki dibetʼamo̩tagalama, ka ku ma gbe̩ e̩wñ n, ma la ko wʼunyi n; ma nʼakpata kpʼaka ugbo ku ma ko e̩wñ jo̩ n; O̩jo̩ la dʼe̩wñ ñwu ma je̩ kpo̩; onumonu oñ me̩ chʼeku tʼame̩we̩ le taa?
Oñ e̩ne̩ dʼef ume̩ kʼi adejiji-i kʼi aneke mʼohibo̩wo̩ʼka du nʼo̩gba-wñ?
Todule̩ iche̩wñ ku me̩ ma la neke che e̩wñ ki nya le̩ n, e̩wñ chi ku me̩ dejiji e̩wñ ki bo̩?
Me̩ dibetʼododo oko le̩, alu kʼo̩la-wñ aya; ma chʼakanya e̩wñ n, ma la chʼowu n; u muda ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Tu So̩lo̩mo̩n ef ojima-wñ du nʼe̩wñ kʼi ko nyʼo̩la dab oka ef abʼe-i n.
I muda che̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ kʼe̩wñ abe̩le̩ nyʼo̩la egbe oko e-kʼi do̩mo̩ eñini, ku ma la ko rikpolo tef igbeli o̩na; onumonu e-kʼi ako nyʼame̩ o̩la atule taa ame̩ abe̩do̩-ekono re-i!
Me̩ ki feju e̩wñ ku me̩ aje̩ kpʼe̩wñ ku me̩ añmo̩ n; ibe-me̩ ki la chʼeji eji n.
Todu abo uche̩ichi ile̩-i jʼatejane̩ e̩wñ le̩ du; Ata-me̩ chema ka kʼeku e̩wñ-i aku me̩.
Ama ame̩ ki feju ojane̩ e-wñ, taku ma akʼe̩wñ-i manyʼu ñwu me̩ kpo̩fo̩.
Me̩ ki railo n, ame̩ ujo̩ amala ree, todabu kʼi cherʼAta-me̩ e̩do̩ kʼi dʼojane̩ le̩ ñwu me̩.

Me̩ kʼane̩-me̩ ta, ku me̩ kʼo chʼele ejumomi; me̩ nachʼalita ki ma jʼagbo n ñw o̩la-me̩, kʼi chʼe̩wñ akoko ki ma atakpa rʼo̩wo̩ n efojale, ugbo kʼajoji du ma te̩me̩ru n, kʼojudu ma la akʼo chile̩che̩ n.
Todu ugbo kʼe̩wñ akoko-me̩ de̩, o̩mo̩ oñ e̩do̩-me̩ ñʼade̩ ge̩.
E̩wñ ki nalʼume̩ ago de, una ki tʼagege-me̩,
ku me̩ jo̩ dab amone̩ ku ma aneju odu-ma kʼi doji kwʼoko uje̩wñ iyawo, todu kʼe̩gba kʼi lewa kʼi la ado̩woko̩na, ma abi ñw u ababa.
Amadu kʼodu-ma lewa ali abu ku ma jʼagwe̩ke̩ adide gbede; ami naka ñwu me̩, ka kʼowñ adʼe̩wñ lʼago o̩la-wñ de, oñ i aje̩ ñwu ma chekukane̩ ku ma jʼe̩wñ, i la awʼugbo ma i ache e̩wñ ñwu ma.
I la che̩wñ kʼi lewa ef ide ekeji abe̩k ef e-e̩ke̩ta, kʼi la fʼuma li abe̩le̩, abo le̩ gbede.
Ama me̩ ki fʼu ma kakini, E̩ne̩fe̩nyi le̩ ma ma auwa e̩gba kʼajoji awa i ma gwe̩ke̩ adide, i ma la je̩ ñwu ma fʼo̩do̩ unyi-wñ gwagudu n.
Ame̩ ki ño̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ mu jo̩, todu iko kʼone̩ ma do̩ kʼO̩ma One̩ awa n, iko le̩ i awa.
Oñ Pita kakini, Ondu, e̩ kpʼita kide̩ ñw awa, abe̩k e̩ne̩ du oñ e̩ kpa ñw u?
Tak Ondu kakini, E̩ne̩ chʼadigede kʼi achubi odu-wñ kʼi ño̩ chenʼibe kʼodu-wñ akʼabunyi-wñ nyʼu o̩wo̩ kʼi mʼukpe̩ uje̩wñ-ma ko ñwu ma iko-wñ taa?
Adu kʼodu-wñ awa li kʼi achʼabe̩le̩ gbede.
Ochochi, naka ñw me̩ kakini, Owñ akʼe̩wñ du ki ne̩ nyʼu o̩wo̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼadu kide̩ ka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, Odu-mi akpo̩kpe̩ ewa, tak i chane̩ egwo abimo̩to̩-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kpʼonobule̩, kʼi chane̩ eje̩ kpʼeñmo̩ kʼo̩te̩ la fʼu mu,
odu adu le̩ awa o̩jo̩ kʼi ma neju owñ n kpʼauwa kʼi ma ma n, tak i akʼo-wñ da meji, oñ i adʼukpe̩-wñ te̩ manyʼabo ku ma ma chubi odu-ma n.
Adu ki la ma e̩wñ ki dʼodu-wñ e̩do̩, kʼi ma la mo̩la tane̩ n, i la che alu ki dʼowñ e̩do̩ n, ma aja o̩me̩me̩le̩;
ama e̩ne̩ ki ma ma n, kʼi la fʼe̩wñ che bʼitali jo̩ ma aja ree. Ma la afeju e̩wñ nana ugbo e̩ne̩ du ku ma kʼe̩wñ ñw u nana, oñ e̩ne̩ ku ma kʼe̩wñ nana nyʼu o̩wo̩, ma atene ololo ugbo-wñ.
U wa kʼu fʼuna ro̩ bʼile̩ ma; iche̩wñ ku ma fʼu ko̩ me̩, e̩wñ ño̩ dʼumi e̩do̩ ge̩?
U chene̩ baptism oka ku ma ache mi, go alu kʼu chʼe̩kpama te̩ gbogbo tʼe̩gba ki fʼoji ne̩.
Ame̩ do̩ ka kʼure̩do̩ oñ u wa kʼu du tef ane̩-ile̩-i? Naka ñw me̩, O̩da; chai edaru.
Todu akwe̩gba-i one̩ me̩lu ajʼef unyiʼka ku ma daru bʼomune̩ te̩; e̩ta agwunyʼeji, eji la agwunyʼe̩ta.
Ma adaru, ata agwunyʼo̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩, o̩mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ la agwunyʼata-wñ; iye agwunyʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩, o̩mʼonobule̩ la agwunyʼiye-wñ; iye-o̩ko̩ agwunyʼo̩yʼo̩ma-wñ, oñ o̩yʼo̩ma agwunyʼiye-o̩ko̩-wñ.
I ño̩ ka ñw o̩wo̩-amone̩ le̩ kakini, E̩gba du ku me̩ li kʼakpa achate̩gu o̩wo̩ o̩lane̩, ababale̩ me̩ kakini, Omi awa; oñ abe̩le̩ i ade̩.
Oñ e̩gba du ku me̩ li kʼafu aju kwʼo̩pata o̩gane̩ me̩ kakini, Ane̩ akpuna eñini; abe̩le̩ i la ade̩.
Ame̩, ame̩nayechi! Ame̩ chema alu ku me̩ añwa eju ane̩-ile̩-i kpʼefojale go; ama abile kʼame̩ ma ma alu ku me̩ añwa iko-i go n?
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ ma la ñwa e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa kpʼojika o̩la-me̩ n?

Todu abu kʼuwe̩ kpʼe̩no̩la-we̩ alo tʼo̩gba agboji, e̩ nache alu du kʼe̩ neke che kʼe̩ ñʼo̩la-we̩ kpʼowñ ru ej o̩na le̩, tode̩gba kʼi afʼuwe̩ nyʼugbo akajo̩, kʼakajo̩ le̩ la mʼe̩ du ñw idegeli tak idegeli le̩ mʼe̩ du rikpolo tef unyiuga.
Naka ñw e̩ kakini, I nʼugbo du kʼe̩ kwʼo̩mo̩ dufu n gbogbo tak e̩ fʼo̩me̩-wñ ra tʼanini otitala.
